definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: Prayer flags was read by thousands of times.
sentences.chinese: 經幡上的經文，頌念千遍萬遍。

sentences.english: Sutra streamer in the wind make the bridge to the heaven.
sentences.chinese: 兩道晨風中的經幡搭起通向天空的橋。

sentences.english: The pass itself is dotted with prayer flags and there are several herds of yak around.
sentences.chinese: 這個關口到處都經幡，附近還有幾個犛牛羣。

sentences.english: Gorgeous Yu Long Xue Shan sets the background for the sea of relgious flags.
sentences.chinese: 壯麗的玉龍雪山，爲五彩經幡旗當背景。

sentences.english: There's a lot of couleur locale here still.
The colorful streamers , how many dreams have bore down upon it?
sentences.chinese: 五色經幡，究竟承載了多少夢想？

definition: all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display

pinyin: Xi3 ma3 la1 ya3 shan1 mai4

definition: to fly up/to dance in the air (of snowflakes, flower petals etc)
brilliant white snow cover (esp. of distant peaks)
Yumen Pass, or Jade Gate, western frontier post on the Silk Road in the Han Dynasty, west of Dunhuang, in Gansu
